Title: Enacts the "over-expenditure, under-expenditure, transfer notification (OUT) act" to provide for the use of surplus appropriated funds and over-expenditure approval
Summary: Enacts the "over-expenditure, under-expenditure, transfer notification (OUT) act" to provide for the use of surplus appropriated funds and over-expenditure approval.
LawCode: Add ยง53-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "over-expenditure, under-expenditure, transfer notification (OUT) act"
